data.description: This is a great opportunity to be part of developing cutting-edge software solutions for Nokia’s telecom networks. You will work closely with a team of software engineers and fellow interns to design and implement application software and services that manage and monitor Nokia’s state-of-the-art 5G networks. Your contributions will help drive a SaaS-first approach, ensuring that the technology developed by your team is both innovative and operationally efficient. Additionally, you will play a key role in validating software functionality through automated testing while gaining hands-on experience in best practices under the mentorship of a senior software architect. Your work will support Nokia’s mission to advance global connectivity and network performance.
